thread.title: UNWTO Ulysses Prize Laureates shared their views on tourism trends and challenges
thread.title_full: UNWTO Ulysses Prize Laureates shared their views on tourism trends and challenges

author: eTN Editor
title: UNWTO Ulysses Prize Laureates shared their views on tourism trends and challenges
text:
UNWTO Ulysses Prize Laureates shared their views on tourism trends and challenges   
Sep 14, 2015 eTN   
On the occasion of the General Assembly, the UNWTO Knowledge Network brought together UNWTO Ulysses Prize Laureates Don Hawkins, David Airey, Kaye Chon and Eduardo Fayous-Sola, for a Special Session and Lunch to discuss current tourism trends and challenges. 
Under the theme “Tourism Today and Tomorrow,” the laureates shared their insights on issues such as governance, partnerships, research and education in a panel discussion moderated by UNWTO’s Executive-Secretary for Members Relations, Carlos Vogeler.
